---
title: "dependabot.yml"
---

## High-level description
This code defines the configuration for Dependabot, a tool that automatically creates pull requests to update dependencies in a repository. It specifies which package ecosystems to monitor, how often to check for updates, and how many pull requests to open concurrently.

## Code Structure
The code is structured as a YAML file that defines a set of rules for Dependabot. Each rule specifies a package ecosystem (e.g., `gomod`, `npm`), a directory to monitor, a schedule for checking updates, and other options like labels and ignored dependencies.
